name: Solar
description: The Solar has a towering, radiant form with large, feathered wings, embodying divine power. It is equipped with a holy sword and displays exceptional physical and magical abilities.
memorable: Its presence inspires awe and fear, and it can automatically detect lies, making it a strong ally and potent enemy.
goals: Solars are typically sent to fight evil, lead celestial armies, or serve as divine champions for their gods.
relations: Solars may be associated with other celestial beings and often engage with evildoers, fiends, or dark forces.
environment: Solars can be encountered in places of significance to good or divine purpose, often in celestial realms or during high-stakes conflicts on the material plane.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage, resistance to radiant damage and nonmagical attacks, and high offensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on melee and spellcasting for damage output, lacking ranged combat capabilities without spells.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack feature with a holy sword, dealing significant slashing and radiant damage. The Column of Flame area attack adds versatility and damage potential in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Innate spellcasting includes powerful spells like resurrection, enabling it to restore life without material components.
equipment: Armed with a holy sword, capable of unleashing greater radiant damage.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive unseen threats.
skills: High perception with a passive score of 24 makes it adept at noticing details and threats in its vicinity.
additional_information: Angelic Weapons deal extra radiant damage on attacks.
Divine Protection imposes disadvantage on attacks against it from certain creature types.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on saving throws it would fail.
Magic Resistance gives it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Champion of Truth ability ensures it cannot tell lies.
spellcasting: Can innately cast spells like commune, control weather, and resurrection, showcasing its incredible divine abilities.
test_queries: large celestial warrior with radiant wings
divine being that can cast resurrection
angelic creature immune to necrotic damage
angel that can detect lies and heal
